name: Online Dating Profile
description: Interview your character using these profile prompts from real online dating sites

attributes.name: Headline
attributes.description: A short tagline that would intrigue a potential partner to learn more about you

attributes.name: About Me
attributes.description: A few paragraphs introducing yourself in a way that would make potential partners interested in communicating with you

attributes.name: Seeking
attributes.description: What type of partner are you seeking? What age range, gender, and other personal details are important to you?

attributes.name: Age
attributes.description: What age are you?

attributes.name: Sexual Preference
attributes.description: What is your sexual preference? (e.g. heterosexual, homosexual, bisexual)

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: What is your gender? (e.g. male, female, nonbinary, transgender)

attributes.name: Pronouns
attributes.description: What pronouns do you use? (e.g. he/him, she/her, they/them)

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Where do you currently live?

attributes.name: Relationship Status
attributes.description: What is your current relationship status? (e.g. single, divorced, in an open relationship)

attributes.name: Height
attributes.description: How tall are you?

attributes.name: Body Type / Weight
attributes.description: What is your body type or weight?

attributes.name: Languages
attributes.description: What languages do you speak?

attributes.name: Education
attributes.description: What level of education do you have? Where did you go to school?

attributes.name: Religion / Spirituality
attributes.description: What is your religious or spiritual background?

attributes.name: Ethnicity
attributes.description: What is your ethnic background?

attributes.name: Smoking / Drinking / Drugs
attributes.description: Do you smoke, drink, or use drugs? If so, what type and how often?

attributes.name: Kids
attributes.description: Do you have kids? If not, would you like to start a family?

attributes.name: Pets
attributes.description: Do you have any pets? If so, what type and how many?

attributes.name: Diet
attributes.description: Do you keep a particular diet or have any dietary restrictions?

attributes.name: Zodiac Sign
attributes.description: What is your astrological sign?

attributes.name: Where were you born?
attributes.description: What is your country or city of birth?

attributes.name: What's the first thing people notice about you?
What are you doing with your life? Do you have a job?
What’s the most important thing you’re looking for in a partner?
What are your short-term goals for yourself this year?
What’s one long-term goal you have for the next five years?
What personal qualities make you especially good at your job?
What have you worked hardest to achieve in your life?
What are you most passionate about?
What are you really good at?
What do you spend a lot of time thinking about?
What aspects of yourself are you most proud of?
What are the three things for which you are most thankful?
What are five things you could never do without?
What activities or moments make you happy to be alive?
How do you typically spend your leisure time?
What do you do on a typical Friday night?
How would you describe your ideal weekend?
What do you wish you did more often?
What are your most and least favorite books, movies, shows, music, and food?
What was the last live event you went to? How did you enjoy it?
What’s your favorite thing to cook?
How would you describe your relationship with your family?
What are your favorite things to do with your friends?
What characteristics do your friends have in common?
What are four words your friends would use to describe you?
What people or life experiences have shaped you the most? How?
How have you been feeling about life lately?
How do you feel about your physical appearance?
What's the most private thing you're willing to admit?
